0.3.name: wordpress/fb-wallpost-widget
0.3.description:
Displays latest wall posts from a Facebook page and shows the text with links to the original posts.

Hassle free

  • No Facebook app or authentication needed
  • No FBML or JavaScript at all
  • No iframes
  • Easy to style
